thread.title: Immigration fight heats up as funding deadline looms

title: Immigration fight heats up as funding deadline looms
text:
Immigration fight heats up as funding deadline looms   01:56 
As another U.S. government funding deadline looms, a huge spending bill is ground zero in the latest battle between Republicans and Democrats in Congress over President Donald Trump’s push to fund immigration detention centers.   
As another U.S. government funding deadline looms, a huge spending bill is ground zero in the latest battle between Republicans and Democrats in Congress over President Donald Trump’s push to fund immigration detention centers.  //reut.rs/2IwB52L
